content.detailedDescription: About 9pm, i was leaving a church meeting,i looked up as i saw an unusual light in the eastern sky, i thought it was most likely a plane i observed a diamond shaped object heading northwest then change direction to northeast, then fade out or disappear behind possible clouds, one minute later i saw another diamond shaped object heading northerly then change to north east both were flying at about 1000 ft up, and meandering slowing, i went to the long island sound to see if i could see anything, thinking perhaps they were just planes and the lights were playing tricks, nothing seen over long island sound except the usual small planes that fly around, those fly in a straight line and display running lites and strobes unlike the diamond shaped objects i saw. on my way back from the l.I sound area,on pulaski rd heading west i looked to my left facing  south and saw a bright light,flying in a straight line heading west i thought once again its just a plane, but just to make sure i stopped and waited for it to pass by an opening in the trees, thinking it would just keep flying west as a small plane would. it stopped then headed north east, ive never seen a small plane do that before, no sound. i am used to small and large planes as i live on l.I which is near kennedy and laguardia and a few small airports, so im used to all the sights and sounds of many different types of planes and helicopters. im usually skeptical about these things but open minded about the possibilty of it being real, i dont go looking for these things but these lites really stood out!
content.summary: Diamond shaped orange glowing object, no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was the early morning of december 20th 2012. closer to 5:30am than 5am. we are often awake this late because my boyfriend works second shift. he and i went outside on the back porch to smoke cigarettes. we have an amazing view of the sky since we are located a few miles outside of any brightly lit town. almost as soon as we stepped outside i noticed what at first appeared to be a very bright star. problem was this particular star was far too large and bright and not located where any known star (that we can see from our porch) normally is. the bright white light was located maybe 55 degrees off the horizon in the northwest. i asked him "what is that?" and he looked curiously at the light and said in a matter of fact tone "i don't know" at this time my boyfriend decided to run in the house and get his dads attention. he was in the house no more than 30 seconds when the object started to move. slowly at first it was just the bright white light looking as though it was decending. then suddenly the light turns bright red and streaks towards me. it left a red trail behind it as it decended towards the horizon and came at me. its lowest point on the horizon was approximately 30 degrees before it started climbing back towards 90 degrees when it was directly above me. when i saw it streaking red i started to scream to get my boyfriend to come back outside so he could see it too. by the time he got back outside (maybe a minute spent inside) the craft was visible as a craft. both of us knew no one would believe we were seeing a ufo so we took out our phones to try and get a picture of it since it was close and we could see it in great detail. first he tried to takw a picture and when he opened up his camera the entire phone shut off. so i triend to take a picture with my phone and when i unlocked the screen the phone froze, then shut off also. our phones wouldnt turn on until the craft was far out of our sight. it was triangular with beigish orangey lights on each corner angle, with a large white circular light in the bottom middle of the craft. the midle light looked almost like a dome underneath. there was also a blue light on top of the craft. it seemed to slow down dramatically as it got closer to us. it was less than 500 feet above us, maybe 300 feet, it was hard to judge but i saw it very clearly. it didn't make a sound the entire time we saw it, even when it was directly overhead. it flew over the house. we ran around the house to follow it and we lost visual contact as it flew past the trees across the street. when i first saw it i knew nothing we know of on this earth moves like that, is shaped like that, flies like that, or is silent like that. however something about the craft seemed very man-made. it was a physical aircraft that me and my boyfriend saw with our own eyes. i don't believe the technology originated here on earth. however i do believe that this craft was built here on earth. i have seen similar craft on you tube videos but who knows whats real or not on you tube. i saw this with my own eyes and my boyfriend was there seeing it with his eyes too.
content.summary: Bright light streaked red towards me, dimmed greatly showing its lights and triangular shape, flew slowly and silently over the house then past the treeline

content.detailedDescription:
It was approx. 9;55 pm est or so when my fiance and i stepped out on the front porch for a cigarette. nice night, warm, clear sky. we had both lit up and we saw the same thing up in the sky just over our eye level - a streak of light. 

both of us had the same reaction, saying 'what the. . .' out loud. i stood up , stepped off the patio to get another look. it wasn't particularly bright, but it was certainly noticeable. 

the white lit object seemed "long" at first, and quite small, which leads me to believe it was very high up there. sort of looked like a very fast moving star. however the light was not steady - i don't want to say that it blinked, because it wasn't blinking, but almost as if it was disappearing and reappearing in a different area of the sky. though as it turned - which it did, several times - you could follow it's projected path and guess where it would reappear. it seemed to circle over us twice or three times and then was gone. 

i didn't know what to think of the object as i viewed it. i had no explanation. in hindsight the woman thinks it could have been a firefly - fair, but they are typically lit up as yellow and hell, they certainly do not move so fast. i've never seen something move so fast in the night sky.
content.summary: Goosebumps weird strange

content.detailedDescription: At roughly 930 to 940 pm on may 29th 2013 i observed a brightly lit object in the sky over i80 about 30 miles east of fernley nevada. first sighting was to the mid left of my windshield, object illuminated taking about 2 seconds to reach full illumination. object stayed lit for about 5 seconds then the lights took about 2 seconds to black out. roughly 15 seconds later the object appeared to the mid right of my windshield again taking 2 seconds to reach full illumination for about 5 seconds followed by 2 seconds to black out. the third and final time between 5 and 10 seconds later the object appeared dead center of the two previous spots and took roughly 2 seconds to fully illuminate however this time i was able to see what looked like 8 or more light sources on the body of this object. the object appeared to be almost rectangular and completely stationary.
content.summary: Bright lights seen over i80.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just leaving the house for work around 9:30pm. it was a saturday.I noticed out of the corner of my right eye a light. i looked up thinking to see a street light but what i was seeing was through the trees. i ran north for about two blocks until the trees were gone. 
 what i seen was something like non other ive ever seen. there were five lights/objects all together. a cluster of three and a cluster of two.The lights werent blinking it was more a pulse from red to oarange to yellow.They hovered for a minute not doing anything to my ne right over ceader point. then all of a sudden they moved alittle to the left and took off in the clouds to my right. i dont know all the airplanes flying the skys.. but i know the ones im used to seeing and it was nothing like that. also they werent helecopters because they were close enough to where id hear five helecopters.. no sound... my camera wouldnt even pick up the lights.. everone later thought i was crazy.Oh also it was a very cloudy night.
content.summary: Looked up to ne and seen 2 clutters. one of 3 and one of 2. pulsated slowly

content.detailedDescription:
After retiring my husband and myself purchased a 40 acre lot east of yucca az. 25 miles out  in the desert.   one night i went to our partially set up mobile home to get something i needed for the dinner i was cooking.My husband accompanied me. after i got what i needed and was leaving the house to return to the 5th wheel and a light caught my eye.  up above me to the east was what appeared to be a large window with two beings in it, facing each other as in conversation. the area around it was totally dark. the person or? on the right was either taller or standing and facing, the one on the left that was either shorter or seated.
 just then my husband come out of the mobil with a flash light and it was as though the light was turned off--gone. i asked my husband to turn off the flashlight. he did, but it was gone. it didn't last longer than say 30 sec. but i know what i saw.
has anything like this been reported before? 
thank you,
sandra l.Patterson
content.summary: window in night sky with 2 beings facing each other.

content.detailedDescription: it was last friday night ,may 24 2013,my wife & i were traveling west on cairo hollow rd.(limestone co. in north alabama). as we were going through some trees , up ahead we saw a very bright light in the sky. my wife asked me what it was , & i was just about to reply ,probably a plane w/ landing lights on, when we saw another one come out from behind the trees ahead. then another one & another & so on.Eventually there were about 10 of them in a line. there were 2 or 3 out front then there were 6 in formation , 2 - 2- & 2. it was one then another just behind & above the 1st. there were 6 like this , then there was one by itself kinda taking up the rear. they were extremely bright and a vivid orange. the brightest orange i've ever seen in the sky. there was a full or near full moon that night & they rivaled it's brightness, only they were of a much diferent color. let me say here that i am very familiar w/ all objects you see in the night sky. i have been an amateur astronomer since i was a kid in the late 60's-early 70's. i have a celestron telescope & have taken a lot of really good photos of nebulae, galaxies, etc. over the years. i also have a background in engineering & was a math major in college. i tell you this to let you know that i know every single thing that you would normally see in the sky.This was nothing i have ever seen before. these things were so unearthly looking, & strange that i can honestly say ,that when we stopped & i got out of the car on this lonely country road, i was actually scared. i mean they looked so unreal. they were heading south at a steady pace but not too fast.Depends on how close they were, but they didn't seem to be that far away ,because we seemed to be getting more up under them before we stopped. they were pulsing a bright orange & sometimes got brighter & then dim a bit. they were far bigger than anything in the sky with the exception of the moon.The point on the road where we stopped ,according to google earth was- 34 deg 52min 15sec n & 87 deg 08min 18.58sec w  as they got to the south of us the strangest thing of all happened. they just were gone. they were there & then they just were'nt. i have no idea where they went,but i'll tell you this, we were both shaken & a bit unsteady as we started to drive again. i want to stress again that we are not nut jobs or crazy people, just a normal couple (other than being musicians-haha) & this was something i just can't explain. my best friend is a florence ala. police officer & he can tell i don't usually run into things i can't explain. this was not any type of aircraft . when i got out & we turned the car off, they were dead silent , no sound at all.They were not planets ,i know all the planets & besides ,they were moving. they weren't meteors, they were too slow ( unless they were really far off -top of atmosphere)but i think they were much closer.They were not weather. were not fireworks, or flares. i thought of flares when i 1st saw them ,but but soon i could see that they were moving horizontally & intelligently. so anyway, i've gone through everything i can think of ,but i just can't think of anything that fits.The total duration was approx. 2 min. we felt strange for a few days & couldn't stop thinking about it. they were just so strange there are no words to truly describe them.............Steve
content.summary: My wife & i were driving west . we saw 1st  one lite , then others as we came out of trees. 10 bright orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard looking through my telescope. i was observing the sky with my naked eyes when i seen this light in the east start to light up slowly then was really bright for around 30 seconds then slowly dimmed to dark.  i went inside my house to start saving my telescope and came back out around 30 seconds later when i noticed the object(bright light) was now in the north eastern sky around 20 degrees.  it stayed bright for around 5 minutes this time move ne then disappeared. never really saw it moving just shining bright hovering. i cannot explain what i saw i just know what i seen.
content.summary: Saw a round light in eastern sky that slowly lit up for around 30 seconds then slowly dimmed like as a lantern

content.detailedDescription:
A friend pointed out an odd light in the sky. i went outside to look at it and saw an orange bright light traveling at a high, steady speed over the hood canal in the direction of bremerton or seattle. it was traveling too fast to be anything artificial like a plane and too slow to be meteore or rocket. we saw a total of about 5 or 6 and they would come every 5 minutes or so. it was only one at a time and they would travel form the farthest we could see toward us then disappear as they were just in front of us. 

there was cloud cover so i don't think the objects were any higher than around 1500 ft. 

i have seen multiple ufos in the past and this seemed to me to be another sighting.
content.summary: Orange bright lights traveling over the hood canal at high speeds.

content.detailedDescription: I live in north central kansas and the other night i was sitting out on our front porch i was looking up at the sky to the north and i saw a bright flash that appeared above the tree line that resemble a picture of the sun with the black spot in the middle. it had a ring around it like you would see in a soho picture where they block out the sun. the ring around it was like fire. the object then went dark and i could visually see a much smaller light on a northern heading. it flared once more then was gone from sight completely.
content.summary: Flaring ufo fire ring dimed flew north flared again then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
- to start off, i can't remember my entire experience due to some of the abduction. i remember half of it but not fully. -
--
i was sound asleep when suddenly it felt like i couldn't move. i awoke to find four six inch tall figures standing in my bedroom beside my bed staring at me and it looked like they were communicating to one another. 

they took me by the hand and led me to their space craft. 
outside were around four to five other objects in the sky. the one i noticed that looked unusual was a flat square ufo, almost like an i-pad but it had no windows or anything, just hovering in the air. 

i was led into a triangular ship which had tables and other occupants of the crew. 
they sat me down on the table while the room got brighter until i blacked out. 
during my experience, i was seeing strange things in my mind. it showed the earth in space with lava coming out of the earth. 
i could see many more oval shaped ufo's flying around on earth, they said there was an invasion coming sometime this year or next. 
i was shown people dying, buildings collapsing , the ground exploding, the sky was blood red, that's about all i remember seeing. 

i couldn't remember much of anything else during my experience but i do remember hearing something of december 21 2013-14. 

i am still recovering from the abduction but this was mainly about all i can remember at the time.. all i can say is i believe there is an invasion coming and we need to be ready, we need to prepare for this.
content.summary: Abduction early morning.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd in person - due to his position the witness wishes to remain anonymous so i put my own phone number down and an alias for the name.  i felt it was important to report this since there have been so many reports of similar objects in the independence and blue springs areas over the past year.  

i have been observing a stationary object with rotating lights on it for several months in the eastern sky from my home in independence, missouri.  the object looks white or silver, and it has very bright blue, green, and white lights on it that appear to rotate around at 1/2 second intervals.  it was always in the same location. it appeared to be the size of an aspirin held at arm's length on most nights. 

on may 18 and 26 i looked outside my window at 2:00 am and saw a similar object at about 30 degrees off the horizon and just over the tree line, only this time it was much closer and much larger - the size of a golf ball or larger, and was much clearer with the very bright lights being clearly visible.  i happened to be watching tv late on both of these nights and saw the object stay in the same position for about 30 minutes, then just blink out and disappear.  i just want to know what this thing is!
content.summary: Large stationary object with rotating lights in independence on two nights

content.detailedDescription:
This is took placed in northern of thailand(chiangmai) on 24, may 2013 around 4:30pm. the person who took these pictures is my aunty she is 67years old, she was using i-pad first she try to take a picture of the flowers along the road side when she got out a car and spotted something unusual. and then she try to catch a picture of the unknown object flying ablove her head about 200ft-500ft also over the power line. the object is bright red-orenge colour dosen't has any noice flying accross from east to northeast with extremely fast speed and the strieght up. she was able to catched 3frames of it, she was in terrified moment.  my aunt only know how to do pictures and do onlines she is 67years old don't lie and don't know all about creating apps or fake pictures. could someone please analyze, identify these pictures if it really a ufo. note**on the far picture it has 2 shiny spots, it impossible to be a stars because during day time.

best regards,
prin nimitkul
content.summary: Large red orange oval shape

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was travelling on 35w-s and exited on 175th st in lakeville, mn
she saw a sphere that appeared oval shaped hovering above the tree line.
it remained stationary. it was reflecting the colors of the sky. one could
see the edges of the sphere, then a transparent area, then the color of the morning sky. the object was viewed through the windshield of the car.
she had the feeling that the object was under intelligent control. she
remembers feeling very nervous and "not now. i have to get to work"
content.summary: Saw a stationary sphere that was reflecting the colors of the sky

content.detailedDescription: While at sycamore park (facing north-west, overlooking aliso creek) stargazing with two friends, i noticed a brightly glowing object that appeared beneath power lines, to the right of a stand of trees, and above a house on a small hill. the object caught my attention because it appeared suddenly and was traveling in a different direction than the easily identifiable commercial aircraft that passed periodically overhead and followed an identical flight path. at first i thought the object might have been an airplane or helicopter with landing (or other) lights illuminated; but it was much brighter than any aircraft landing lights i had ever observed previously. it seemed to be traveling faster than the commercial aircraft in the sky. there were no blinking lights associated with this object. the glow suddenly faded over a period of approximately two seconds, transitioning from bright white, to soft blue-green, to faint blue-white. the object then disappeared. i mentioned the presence of the object to my friends, one of whom looked up just after it disappeared. i immediately wondered whether it was a satellite; although it had glowed brightly in a similar manner to a large meteor, it was moving much too slowly (800-1200 mph from my vantage point, assuming it was at roughly the same altitude as the commercial aircraft). the object then reappeared about six inches of sky to the right of its last observed location. it glowed a soft blue-green and faded to blue-white over a period of about three seconds. again, i told my friends. it disappeared again, at which time i concluded that it was not a satellite, as i had never seen one glow brightly, disappear, reappear, then disappear again; it was unlike any aircraft, meteor, or satellite i had seen before. my friend had looked up again, but was too late to see it. the object reappeared a final time, some five or six inches to the right of its previous location, and one or two inches farther north. it seemed to have changed direction slightly. i told my friends once more, and one of them looked up, then exclaimed that she saw it, too. (the other had not been paying attention.) again it glowed a soft blue-green and faded to a faint blue-white over a period of two or three seconds. i lost sight of the object when it did not reappear.
content.summary: Object first observed when it suddenly glowed a bright white; object reappeared twice some distance from its previous position, disappeared three times. eastbound, then north-eastbound.

content.detailedDescription: In backyard   930 pm watched it drop down slowly morph into tri w lites then shoot up and out leaving lite trail
content.summary: It was the smaller triangle that drops off the spheres

content.detailedDescription:
My sister , mother and my son and two of my sisters daughter were heading home from a wichita kansas shopping trip. it was late at night, no other cars on the road, no homes or lights in the area at the time. i was in the back seat of the car. i had the window down looking at the stars.  i saw three bright dots in a formation, on a little in front of the other two shoot across the sky, high up where the sati lights are. there were no read light or other lights at all on these dots or ships. they went lightening fast across the night sky then turned in formation
backward heading west. they had been traveling from the west toward the east. they made a sharp > turn looked just like the little sign i put up. nothing i know of can do that, they did not look like they were all attached lights but could have beeni guess. i did not think so at the time.
they went across the whole sky that i could observe then with out a moments hesitation went the other way. i know i was a ufo, only time i have ever seen one. or three?  i do not had direct time or year becasue it was so long ago, but i never forgot. i started not to even mention it, when i came across this site, but i thouhgt may be some one else might have reported the soame thing.  we were heading back home to garden city, and were about half way home, between wichita and garden when i saw this.
all i got, sorry  linda katz age 63  garden city kansas
content.summary: Three lights high in sky above airplane flights, moving unbelievably fast. all three change course in a blink of an eye, and went farther than i could see.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to have a cigarette on my back deck, which faces south, southwest, and thought i was watching a plane come in, until it stopped moving.  i tried to rationalize what i was seeing and thought it could be a helicopter, but there was no sound.  i knew it wasn't a satellite or the i.S.S. (which i had seen fly through the sky a few weeks earlier).  i immediately thought i was looking at arcturus or sirius, but sirius hadn't even risen above the horizon and i was able to locate arcturus in the eastern part of the night sky almost directly above me; but whatever i was looking at was far brighter than arcturus.  
i then received a call from my brothers girlfriend and told her to go outside and look in the direction that i was witnessing the object.  the first thing she said when she found it in the sky was that it was pulsating and changing colors.  then she asked me what it was and if it could be a comet or asteroid.  i had explained that if it were either of these that we would be seriously screwed because it would have a trajectory path towards earth, and that it would be visible during the day time hours.  
while on the phone with her i had grabbed a pair of binoculars and steady them with a tripod.  i was able to observe the object which was cylindrical in nature, like a cigar, rotate in the sky while changing colors and pulsating light.  at one point it actually looked like an upside down jellyfish.  it was very weird!  when i had finished speaking with her i grabbed my camera and mounted it on my tripod and tried taking a few shots of the object before it disappeared behind the tree line.  i sat there wondering what it was that i had just seen and why i wasn't seeing any other aircraft in the sky.  normally, i can sit and watch planes coming in to land at boston fly a specific flight path, where this object was located; hence why i initially thought it was an airplane.  
the following night i thought i would try to look in the same area for the object i observed and was amazed to see it in the night sky for a second night in a row!  i thought i could repeat the process on the third night, but it was no longer there.  i thought i would try and give it a shot on the fourth night and again no luck, however the planes that take the flight path where the object was witnessed finally began running again, leaving me to believe that it was not coming back.
content.summary: I know it wasn't arcturus or sirius, but was significantly brighter

content.detailedDescription:
seen while driving southbound through town with my son. 3 yellow-orange fireballs/lights/orbs hovering just above the southern end of the organ mountain range. the sun had set 30 min or so, so it was dark out. the lights did not move. they formed a triangle formation. one on top, one directly below it, and one off to the right. they would occasionally blink out, in random order, but were on more than off. they never broke formation, never moved. they glowed, but did not shine like a regular light, no light emitted from them, as in they did not light up the sky around them.

they were positioned just above the mountains in a close enough formation for my fist held out in front of me would have covered it. they were approx. 5 miles away from me. they were larger than any star in the sky above but much smaller than the moon (which was large and almost full, it had just risen).

i have never before seen anything like this, as in lights do not behave like this or look like this as far as i know.
content.summary: 3 fireballs over the organ mountains, triangle formation, random blinking on & off for 6 min.

content.detailedDescription:
On memorial day 2013 i wanted to confirm whether my gym was opened. the result of my search produced amazing alien craft surrounded by approximately 3-5 force fields surrounding the craft... also in the space and direction it was heading had an unusual light and dimentional properties.... 

trust me. this is the real thing.
content.summary: While looking up an address online, i panned upward and notice the craft. additionally for good measure i also searched several addresses blocks 5-10 away from intitial sighting, and confirmed the craft as real. also  force fields were emitted from craft.

content.detailedDescription: Was sleeping on a rock outside in sierra foothills, next to new friend and her baby, had built a fire on the rock between us. woke up suddenly and dreamily and sat up in my sleeping bag, in my left peripheral vision i saw my neighbor sit up at the same time looking upward as i was, the baby stayed sleeping. a star was talking to us in our minds, near,far,bright,dim,fast, slow,big,small, all these adjectives. i was covered with a feeling of peace and joy as had never felt before. i was sixteen. don't remember any conversation,except when they told me they were going to leave, i asked, pleaded with them to take me with them, they kindly told me no and to lay down and go back to sleep, as i did. out of the corner of my eye,saw my friend lay back down also. also noticed the baby was still sleeping, but the fire was out, where it had been flaming before. woke up the next morning and started to tell my friend of this wonderful dream i had, she stopped me and told me she had had the same dream. she wanted to go with them also, but worried about her baby. i would have just thought of this experience as just a dream, if not for another having the exact observations and feelings as me. i went home the next day and never saw her again.
content.summary: Light{star}fast,slow,near,far telepathic,peace,joy, lost time,wanted to go with them, refused ,kind. thought was dream, friend near had same dream

content.detailedDescription: Reddish object traveling slow. not a plane.
content.summary: Reddish

content.detailedDescription: Okay first i would like to say i have no idea what this was. i can only go by my memory of the event. but the event is still very vivid in my memory. i have never told anyone else about this but my wife. there was only 1 other witness to this phenomenon and unfortunately she passed away in 1999. i only asked her about it one time in my life about this indecent and that was in 1998 i think it was in sept/oct of that year. for many years i thought that what i experienced was a dream until me and her talked. she was my cousin and she also experienced what happened. this happened i think it was in 1989 or 1990 i can't be sure. but me and my cousin her name was aleshia was at a playground that was down the hill and behind her home in a place called the west end housing community. where the playground stood there is now a home. the entire housing project was tore down and rebuilt in 2004. it was a warm summer day and it was approximately 8pm. me and my cousin were sitting on a set of swings just talking and swinging back and forth. there was a basketball court about 30 feet from the playground. a couple of older kids that lived 4 houses down from my cousin were setting up a ramp made with 2x4's and a concrete cinder-block. they were riding a dirt bike and jumping the ramp. there was 3 of them. i didn't know them personally or know their names. i also have no idea if they experienced what me and my cousin experienced or not. as i was swinging i leaned my head back and that's when i first noticed it. in the distance across the railroad yard was a ball of light and it was rapidly changing colors. it looked to be at a good distance away but within about 5 seconds it was directly in front of us. the glowing ball was about the size of a basketball maybe a little bigger. me and my cousin both stopped swinging immediately and began to gaze at this object. for some reason she said nothing to me and i said nothing to her. we both were not afraid. i asked her in 1998. honestly i can't tell you what i was feeling because i felt nothing different then i normally did. as this ball of light hovered about 2 feet off the ground it slowly moved closer to us. i could have reached out and touched it if i wanted to that's how close it was. it was changing colors  the entire time. i couldn't tell you all the colors it flashed because there was so many. the ball proceeded to circle in between us and around us 2 times. as this was happening we both didn't move or say a word. it wasn't because we couldn't. i don't know how to explain it. it was like we just didn't seem to care. we didn't follow it with our eyes or anything. the object came back in front of us and suddenly there was a flash of light like a flash of a camera. then it was gone. for some strange reason neither one of us didn't even acknowledge what just happened. i did notice that right before the flash the sun was just starting to set. now it was almost dark. we both looked at each other and said our goodbye's and started our way home. my house was only 1 minute away. when i reached my home i seen the clock said 9:12. i remember when i left my house it was right before 8pm. the playground was only a minute away. so i figured about 45 minutes had passed since we seen the ball of light. me and her had no recollection of where those minutes had went. the guys riding the dirt-bike had packed up there ramp and was gone. neither of us remember seeing them leave. back in 1998 was the first time i ever mentioned it to her and even before i could finish my question she finished it for me. she looked at me with big eyes and said i thought that was a dream i had. well that's what i tried to convince myself all these years,but it wasn't once we compared notes we were both stunned. she was in the process of leaving to go get her daughter during this discussion. she told me we would talk about it at another time because she said she was now scared. well we really didn't see each other that much and before i got to talk to her about it she died in a car accident. now over the years i have never mentioned this no anyone. i just thought people would call me crazy. i don't have any memories of anything that happened during our lost time. but as a child before this incident i use to have some crazy night experiences. one thing that i remember was i use to hear knocking in the corner of my house on the roof. i thought maybe it was just my imagination,but this also happened at my grandmother's house also. the knocking was very loud and clear and the last time i remembered it happening was in 1997 at my grandmothers. well about 8 months ago i told my wife about all of this. and i swear on my child about 2 or 3 days later we heard very distinct knocking in the corner of our bedroom at her parents house where we live. there is more stuff that had happened to me when i was a child but i really couldn't type it all. so that's mt story do what you want with ti but it's the truth and i ain't crazy or lying.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription: My son said this thing followed him in the woods too..  after the first shot on the edge of mountain.. then on trail in woods..  thank u... we don't know what it is... one orb   two places same time
content.summary: One orb  2 pictures

content.detailedDescription: My grandson was driving to a friend's house and as he was looking left for cars at an intersection noticed unusual object in the twilight sky. he thought it was fireworks.  it was red and glowing and was moving east to west. moving steadily.  looked at it puzzled and just watching it.  there was a car behind him who honked and he drove off and lost sight of it.  he took a picture of it on his i-phone.
content.summary: Observed reddish orb traveling east to west

content.detailedDescription: Last night i saw a very unusally small treetop level object flying and hovering then changing directions unlike a plane or any known craft then 2 other equally strange lights similar to each of the 3 appeared.I had seen a small aircraft before i saw the sighting.The night before on memorial day evening at 11:00 pm i saw a light come out of nowhere and go from a dead stop to a real fast takeoff in the direction of the highway followed by another light moving slowly but giving chase.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Second strange light or ufo in 2 nights in a row

content.detailedDescription:
I was just admiring the beautiful fool moon night and said to myself let me take picture of it with my phone. so i took several photos and to my surprise later on realized what was flying by the moon so i took some more shots hoping to catch what i was experiencing in some way. it has so far happened twice. pretty cool when you see something of this magnitude with your own eyes and get to capture a glimpse of the true living breathing universe. 
now it's not just stories i've heard it makes a difference on how you judge and determine others encounters. 
may truths be told and understood.
content.summary: Ufo by the moon

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping 4-d dimension you know .I knew the object was coming to meet me because i already saw it in meditation.A vary particlar shape like spherre or triangle consistante with a commander quarters like below the ship like a blimp going strait from the s.W. this one maynot be back for a year.My viewing of this object was not in the 3-d dimension but the long lost 3rd eye while sleeping or daydreaming after my encounter about 1 p.M central 5/28/2013 a military choper flew over followed by a jet around 2:30 a little late i quess bayou brian: comedian,brian whisper:galactic free press ;home crew and brian bradley 3-d just me the great iam as you are too.

content.summary: While meditating in 4-d sleeprealm new object wascoming. after an hour or 2 government surveillance took over. they were a little late (lol)

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out my front door after hearing something outside my window. i looked across the field and observed 3 bright light low in the sky nw of where i stood. luckily i had a camera in my truck and ran to get it. i then filmed 3.30 minutes of the objects hovering. they were in a triangle shape and move together so i thought it was a single craft until the one to the farthest right made a path to the north and disappeared. then the one to the left did the same. eventually the one left also did the same.
  i watch the sky often and have never seen aircraft in this area like this before. i walked back inside to look at the video and heard a couple jets fly over. now it is pretty silent. oh, also, while i was outside the neighbors horses were acting very strange.
content.summary: 3 orbs hover over gilroy, ca.

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday, 5/27/2013 at around 3:15 to 3:30 pm, my wife, daughter and i were in our pool when my wife pointed out a "white dot" that appeared to be tumbling and falling over south hall county. we observed it for about 5 minutes before a cloud bank obscured it. it appeared to be shiny, depending on how the large surface was turned in our direction. it was erratic, and not under any apparent control. it had an erratic movement, both downward and laterally.  with the motion it displayed, occasionally a larger, reflection surface appeared to us.  we could not estimate the size, due to the altitude above the clouds, but had the idea of a tumbling door from an aircraft. when i realized it was moving laterally too occasionally, i went into the house to get my binoculars, but when i got back, it had disappeared behind the clouds and the tree line, based on the movements the last time we saw it.  this was in a north, northeast direction from us.  we speculated that it could have been maybe a door coming off an aluminum skinned aircraft. i have been watching out for reports, but have heard nothing.
content.summary: My wife, daughter and i observed this object that was bright and appeared to be falling
